name: cphnvc

stmt.origin: sylanbrc(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(c0, cnlm), wcel(c0, clvec))
stmt.pretty: sylanbrc(c0 ∈ CPreHil, c0 ∈ NrmVec, c0 ∈ NrmMod, c0 ∈ LVec)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c0, cnvc))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c0, cnlm))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c0, clvec))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cnvc), wa(wcel(c0, cnlm), wcel(c0, clvec)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CPreHil → c0 ∈ NrmVec)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CPreHil → c0 ∈ NrmMod)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CPreHil → c0 ∈ LVec)
⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmVec ↔(c0 ∈ NrmMod ∧ c0 ∈ LVec))

-| wb(wcel(c0, cnvc), wa(wcel(c0, cnlm), wcel(c0, clvec)))

comment: A subcomplex pre-Hilbert space is a normed vector space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Oct-2015.)
